original_title: MARS 空からの訪問者~回想~特別編
overview: Gackt Live Tour 2000 MARS ~Visitor from the Sky: La réminiscence~ was the first live tour of Gackt, and it was released on VHS on October 4, 2000, and DVD on November 11, 2000.  The video recording of the final concert was filmed on June 1, 2000 at the Yokohama Arena.
title: Gackt Live Tour 2000 MARS ~Visitor from the Sky: La réminiscence~
